hide_bot_open: Hide bot 'Open' button in chat list
hide_hd_icon: Hide HD icon in media picker
prevent_webapp_swipe_down: Prevent swipe down in webapp bots
disable_article_viewer_swipe: Disable article viewer swipe to close
confirm_forward_message: Are you sure you want to forward this message?
confirm_join_chat_subtext: Show a confirmation dialog before joining channels or groups
join_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to join **{chat_name}**?
thank_you_message:
Thank you for using UiTweaks! Feedback?
Join: @QuantaPlugins
hide_bot_open_subtext: Hides the 'Open' button that appears next to bot names in the chat list
hide_hd_icon_subtext: Hides the HD icon that appears on media items in the media picker
hide_star_reaction_subtext: Hides the star reaction from reactions
hide_action_menu_items_subtext: Hides specific items from the chat action menu
hide_drawer_icon_subtext: Hides the hamburger menu icon (3 lines) in chat action bar
hide_search_bar_subtext: Hides the search bar in chat action bar
hide_phone_number_subtext: Replaces other users' phone numbers with 'Mobile hidden' in profiles for privacy reasons
hide_archived_chats_subtext: Completely hides archived chats from the main chat list
hide_bot_button: Hide bot button in input field
hide_bot_button_subtext: Hides the bot button that appears in the chat input field when bots are available
hide_call_buttons_subtext: Hides voice and video call buttons in user profiles
hide_group_voice_chat_icon_subtext: Hides the voice chat icon from group profiles
always_show_download_manager_subtext: Makes the download manager always visible in the menu
always_show_proxy_button_subtext: Makes the proxy button always visible in the action bar
prevent_swipe_while_editing_subtext: Disables Telegram's swipe-to-right (back gesture) when editing a message to prevent accidental navigation
prevent_swipe_while_typing_subtext: Disables Telegram's swipe-to-right (back gesture) when the keyboard is open to prevent accidental navigation
prevent_webapp_swipe_down_subtext: Disables swipe-down to minimize gesture when using webapp bots
disable_article_viewer_swipe_subtext: Disables the annoying swipe-to-close gesture in the browser/ArticleViewer
confirm_stickers_subtext: Show confirmation dialog before sending sticker
confirm_voice_subtext: Show confirmation dialog before sending voice message
confirm_commands_subtext: Show confirmation dialog before sending slash commands (e.g. /start)
confirm_round_video_subtext: Show confirmation dialog before sending round video messages
confirm_video_file_subtext: Show confirmation dialog before sending normal video files
confirm_photo_subtext: Show confirmation dialog before sending photo
confirm_document_subtext: Show confirmation dialog before sending generic files
confirm_gif_subtext: Show confirmation dialog before sending animated GIF
confirm_forward_subtext: Show confirmation dialog before forwarding messages
confirm_deeplinks_subtext: Show confirmation dialog before opening Telegram deep links
confirm_ayugram_deeplinks_subtext: Show confirmation dialog before opening Ayugram deep links
performance_warning_message:
UiTweaks enhances exteraGram/AyuGram with advanced features, but some of them may affect device performance. The plugin uses method hooks to modify exteraGram/AyuGram behavior, continuously monitors user interactions, dynamically changes UI elements, and consumes additional memory. These processes may affect device performance over time.

**Recommendations:**
• Enable only the features you actively use
• Restart exteraGram/AyuGram from time to time to clear temporary memory
• If you notice slowdowns, disable UiTweaks or specific features for better performance
all_features_disabled: All UiTweaks features have been disabled.
confirm_send_message: Do you really want to send this {message_type}?
ayugram_deeplink_message: This AyuGram link may redirect to automatically playing content with blocked controls.
confirm_deeplink_message:
Do you really want to open this deep link?
{url}
enable_reply_private_chat_subtext: Adds 'Reply in private chat' option to message context menu for group messages
enable_no_quote_forward_subtext: Adds 'NoQuote forward' option to message context menu to forward messages without sender attribution
hide_reaction_button_subtext: Hides the reaction count button that appears in chat activity
dont_auto_play_next_voice: Don't Auto Play Next Voice Message
dont_auto_play_next_voice_subtext: Stop playback after each voice message instead of playing the next one automatically
unread_badge_on_back_button_subtext: Shows unread message count on the back button
enable_recent_chats_menu_subtext: Shows recent chats when long-pressing the drawer icon in chat list
clear_recent_chats_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all recent chats?
confirm_send_message_plural: Do you really want to send {message_type}?
typing_instead_sticker: Send Typing Instead of Choosing Sticker
typing_instead_sticker_subtext: Shows 'typing...' status instead of 'choosing sticker' when opening sticker picker
fab_settings_shortcut_subtext: Long press FAB to open UiTweaks settings
removed_protection_message: Removed scam links/user protection due to the lack of contribution
confirm_external_links_subtext: Show a confirmation dialog before opening external links
